title: Assistant Professor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Everyone was respectful. The Director set the tone and offered support. The additional faculty seemed busy but asked good questions. Overall it was a good experience but it want the right fit for me.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to teach here?

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Gannon University
Interview Descriptions:
It was a descriptive interview process..
Skills like c, c++, and java springs were tested......
Written tests and practical tests were taken.
I had to undergo 4 rounds of the interview process
Interview Questions: Intermediate level of question was asked w.r.t to the coding languages

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Gannon University
Interview Descriptions: One phone,  one in person. I am literally filling this out so I can read about some other companies. The interview was fine. You do a presentation. The in person interview is around 4 hours. You get lunch.
Interview Questions: Scenarios in higher Ed and student theory

title: Cyber Security Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Gannon University in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: Easy and very straight forward to speak with the decision makers. They seem very professional in their work and also very detailed oriented. The Catholic atmosphere is readily apparent. The people are very nice it seems.
Interview Questions: What about job description did you have questions about.

title: Professor Interview
Interview Descriptions:
Lengthy thorough process. Took a long time.
Apply online with qualifications and any required documents. Teaching presentations and research presentations were done as well. Processes were done one step at a time.
Interview Questions: Why would you like to teach here

title: Building Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Gannon University
Interview Descriptions: In person interview with one other candidate. Supersivor was personable and asked General questions on past experiences and management of teams. I did get the job and would recommend others do it to gain supervisorial experience.
Interview Questions:
Any past management experience?

Situational questions about managing a team. Etc...

title: Career Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Gannon University
Interview Descriptions: Not much time between interview stages. Started with  2 phone calls and then an in person meeting where I made a presentation and had an individual interview with everyone in the office.
Interview Questions: To Prepare a presentation for undecided college students.

title: Systems Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Gannon University (Erie, PA) in Dec 2019
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews scheduled a week apart. The first was a short introduction. The second was more technical with a larger group. The process was relatively relaxed and the people were easy to talk to.
Interview Questions: What is the difference between LDAP and Active Directory?

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Gannon University (Erie, PA) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: Full day interview.  Meet with committee, department chair, dean, provost.  Also, teaching demonstration for about 30 minutes.  Everyone was nice and supportive.  It was a fair interview.  Lunch is with students.
Interview Questions: What about Gannon's mission draws you to teach here?

title: Secretary Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Gannon University in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: Over the phone interview, then in-person interview with several people at once. Staff and faculty were friendly and open about expectations for the position and willing to answer my questions about the position.
Interview Questions:
Why do you want to work for this organization?
What's your comfort level with multitasking?

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Gannon University (Erie, PA) in Aug 2010
Interview Descriptions: I had one interview held at Starbucks. It was very informal. I was asked a couple of questions regarding marketing. I was offered the job a couple of days later.
Interview Questions: The fact that I didn't have too many questions asked was unexpected.

title: Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Gannon University (Erie, PA) in Mar 2010
Interview Questions: What intended you to apply to this position?

title: Workstudy Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Gannon University (Erie, PA) in Jun 2009
Interview Descriptions: I was given the position through a referral at the beginning of my freshman year. Most interviews are conduct by the department you seek to work for. Very simple process, if you are competent, can use a computer and have a good attitude you have a good chance of getting hired.
Interview Questions: Name three things you can do with a pencil other than write or draw.
